topic.zh: 竇房結功能異常（病竇症候群）

definition.en: The sinoatrial (SA) node fails to generate or conduct impulses at rates sufficient to meet the body's physiological demands. Diagnosis requires BOTH symptoms AND ECG abnormalities. Common manifestations include bradycardia, pauses, or alternating tachycardia-bradycardia.
definition.zh: 竇房結（SA node）無法產生或傳導足以滿足身體生理需求的心跳速率，且必須同時具備症狀與心電圖異常才能成立診斷。常見表現包括心跳過慢、停搏、或心跳快慢交替。

items.en: SA node fibrosis (most common): Aging leads to replacement of SA node and surrounding atrial tissue with fibrous tissue
items.zh: 竇房結纖維化（最常見）：老化導致竇房結與周圍心房組織被纖維組織取代

items.en: Ischemia: SA node artery stenosis, commonly seen in inferior myocardial infarction (Clinically, degenerative fibrosis is most common; isolated ischemic SA node injury is less frequent and usually accompanies inferior MI or direct SA node artery damage)
items.zh: 缺血：竇房結動脈狹窄，常見於下壁心肌梗塞（臨床上以退化性纖維化最常見，單純缺血性竇房結損傷則較少見，多伴隨下壁心肌梗塞或竇房結動脈直接受損）
浸潤性疾病：澱粉樣變性、肉芽腫病（sarcoidosis）、血鐵沉積症
發炎性疾病：心肌炎、風濕熱

items.en: Genetic mutations: SCN5A, HCN4 gene mutations

items.zh: 非二氫吡啶類鈣離子通道阻斷劑（verapamil、diltiazem）
乙醯膽鹼酯酶抑制劑（如 donepezil）
阻塞性睡眠呼吸中止症

definition.en: SA node fires normally but at a slow rate (HR < 60 bpm); pathological when < 50 bpm or inappropriate for clinical context
definition.zh: 竇房結發電正常，但頻率慢（HR < 60 bpm）；當 < 50 bpm 或不適合臨床情境時為病理性

ecg_findings.en: Normal waveform: Each QRS preceded by a normal P wave; PR interval normal (120–200 ms)
ecg_findings.zh: 正常波形：每個 QRS 前必有正常 P 波，PR 間期正常（120–200 ms）

ecg_findings.en: Proportional prolongation: P–P and R–R intervals are regular and lengthen synchronously
ecg_findings.zh: 等比例延長：P–P 與 R–R 間距整齊且同步延長

definition.en: SA node automaticity failure; temporarily stops firing
definition.zh: 竇房結自動性失效，暫時不發電

ecg_findings.en: Complete absence: P-QRS-T suddenly disappears, forming a long isoelectric line; significant if > 3 seconds
ecg_findings.zh: 整段消失：P-QRS-T 突然消失，形成長段等電位線；> 3 秒具臨床意義

ecg_findings.en: Non-integer multiple: Pause duration has NO integer multiple relationship with baseline P–P interval (random pause)
ecg_findings.zh: 非整數倍：停頓時間與基準 P–P 間期無整數倍數關係（隨機停）

definition.en: SA node fires but the impulse fails to conduct out (conduction disorder)
definition.zh: 竇房結有發電，但訊號傳不出去（傳導障礙）

description.en: Conduction delayed but all impulses conducted. Cannot be diagnosed on ECG; only detectable by electrophysiology study.
description.zh: 傳導延遲但皆通過。ECG 無法診斷，僅能由電生理檢查發現。

description.en: P–P intervals progressively shorten until a beat is dropped; pause duration is LESS than 2× the sum of P–P intervals (grouped beating)
description.zh: P–P 逐漸縮短直到脫落；停搏時間小於 2 倍 P–P 總和（心搏成組）

description.en: P–P intervals are fixed, then sudden P wave drop; pause duration is an INTEGER MULTIPLE of P–P (usually 2×)
description.zh: P–P 間期固定，突然掉 P 波；停搏時間為 P–P 的整數倍（通常為 2 倍）

description.en: Complete failure of impulse conduction out of SA node

definition.en: Alternating episodes of rapid atrial rhythms (AF, AFL, AT, SVT) with sinus or pacemaker-dependent bradycardia over time
definition.zh: 指心房快速心律（如 AF、AFL、AT、SVT）與竇性或節律器依賴的心搏過緩在時間上互相交替

definition.en: Heart rate fails to increase adequately when physiological demand increases (e.g., during exercise)
definition.zh: 生理需求增加（運動）時，心率升不上去

ecg_findings.en: Resting ECG may be completely normal; problem manifests during exercise testing or daily activities with inadequate heart rate increase
ecg_findings.zh: 靜息 ECG 可完全正常；問題多在運動測試或日常活動時，心率上升幅度不足

ecg_findings.en: Exercise testing: Peak heart rate fails to reach 80% of predicted maximum (220 − age); or Heart Rate Reserve fails to reach 80%
ecg_findings.zh: 運動測試：峰值心率未達預測最大值（220−年齡）的 80%；或 Heart Rate Reserve 未達 80%

overview.en: Treatment Strategies for Sinus Node Dysfunction

acute_management.zh: 疾病當下的處置（急性處理）

reversible_causes.en: Rule Out and Correct Reversible Factors

items.en: Drug-induced: β-blockers, non-DHP CCBs, digoxin, amiodarone, clonidine, lithium, ivabradine → STOP OFFENDING AGENT
items.zh: 藥物誘發：β-阻斷劑、非 DHP CCBs、digoxin、amiodarone、clonidine、lithium、ivabradine → 停用致病藥物

items.en: Electrolyte abnormalities: Hyperkalemia, hypomagnesemia → CORRECT IMBALANCE
items.zh: 電解質異常：高血鉀、低血鎂 → 矯正失衡

items.en: Metabolic or systemic issues: Hypothyroidism, hypothermia, increased vagal tone, hypoxia → TREAT CONDITION
items.zh: 代謝或其他系統性問題：甲狀腺機能低下、低溫、迷走神經張力過高、低氧 → 治療根本病因

items.en: Acute MI (particularly inferior MI affecting RCA supply to SA node) → REPERFUSION THERAPY
items.zh: 急性心肌梗塞（特別是影響 RCA 供應竇房結的下壁心梗）→ 再灌流治療

pharmacotherapy.zh: 症狀性心搏過緩的藥物治療

dose.en: 0.5–1 mg IV, may repeat q3–5min (max 3 mg)
dose.zh: 0.5–1 mg IV，可每 3–5 分鐘重複（最大 3 mg）

notes.en: First-line; less effective in denervated hearts or infranodal block
notes.zh: 第一線用藥；對去神經化心臟或結下阻斷效果較差
經由 β₁ 刺激產生正性變時作用
可作為 dopamine 的替代選擇

notes.en: Pure β-agonist; use cautiously in ischemia
notes.zh: 純 β 致效劑；缺血時需謹慎使用

indications.zh: 藥物治療無效的血流動力學不穩定

indications.en: High-risk features: Syncope, prolonged pauses > 3 seconds while awake
indications.zh: 高風險特徵：昏厥、清醒時停搏 > 3 秒
作為永久性節律器植入前的過渡

description.zh: 可立即執行但不舒適 – 需要鎮靜/止痛

long_term_management.zh: 後續治療與長期預防策略

discontinue_offending_agents.zh: 盡可能停用或避免致病藥物

agents.en: Non-DHP Calcium Channel Blockers (e.g., diltiazem, verapamil)
agents.zh: 非 DHP 鈣離子通道阻斷劑（如 diltiazem、verapamil）
乙醯膽鹼酯酶抑制劑（如 donepezil）

steps.en: Initiate rate/rhythm control – allows safe use of AV nodal blocking agents
steps.zh: 開始心率/節律控制 – 可安全使用房室結阻斷藥物

steps.en: Catheter ablation for AF – may be considered in select patients
steps.zh: 心房顫動導管消融術 – 可於特定患者考慮

items.en: Assess stroke risk using CHA₂DS₂-VASc score if concomitant AF
items.zh: 若合併心房顫動，使用 CHA₂DS₂-VASc 評分評估中風風險

items.en: Anticoagulation decision based on AF burden, NOT pacemaker presence
items.zh: 抗凝血決策基於心房顫動負擔，而非節律器是否存在

indication.en: Indicated for symptomatic sick sinus syndrome patients (fatigue, dizziness, syncope) after ruling out reversible causes
indication.zh: 用於有症狀（疲倦、頭暈、昏厥）的病竇症候群患者，且已排除可逆病因

follow_up.en: Regular follow-up and cardiovascular comorbidity management
follow_up.zh: 定期檢查、控制心血管共病

pacemaker_decision.zh: 是否需要裝設永久性心臟節律器？

yes_criteria.en: Symptomatic (fatigue, dizziness, syncope), reversible causes ruled out, persistent dysfunction
yes_criteria.zh: 有症狀（疲倦、頭暈、昏厥）、已排除可逆病因、持續性功能異常

no_criteria.en: Asymptomatic, reversible cause identified and corrected
no_criteria.zh: 無症狀、可逆性病因已識別並矯正

dysfunction_location.en: Dysfunction occurs at the SA Node level (impulse generation or exit conduction)
dysfunction_location.zh: 功能異常發生於竇房結（電訊號產生或傳出）
